articles.content: LGs OLED TVs are some of our favorites, making this a deal worth jumping on. LGs OLED TVs are some of our favorites, making this a deal worth jumping on. by Sheena Vas… [+2505 chars]

articles.title: New Sims Game Isn’t For Everyone, But It’s Perfect for Me - Game Rant
articles.description: This upcoming Sims game might not be for everyone, but I can't wait to experience its new life on Apple Arcade. Here's why you should be excited, too.
articles.content: When I recently admitted that Ive played The Sims 4 for over 2,000 hours, someone gently pointed out that this translates to nearly 86 days of my life. Its a number that sounds a little horrifying on… [+6115 chars]

articles.title: They Don't Make Supercars Like This Anymore - Motor1.com
articles.description: The 01 Zagato from Capricorn Group is a hand-built carbon-fiber supercar making nearly 900 horsepower while costing nearly $3.4 million. Here are all the details.
articles.content: You may not have heard of Capricorn Group, but you've likely seen its work. The company is a German outfit that supplies components to Formula 1, LMP1, World Endurance Championship, and other racing … [+3021 chars]
